### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    purchase_history JSON
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
